content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia Müller. While I appreciate your interest in our Munich apartment, let us focus solely on discussing the rental price during our negotiation. To initiate, I propose a price of 1500 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your initial offer, but I have to negotiate. How about 1300 Euro per month?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because lowering the price significantly compromises my financial expectations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I respect your position. How about 1400 Euro per month?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 1400 Euro! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
